jrobots.simulation

Class SimulationState

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrobots.simulation.SimulationState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SimulationState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains one simulation state.
    For every simulation tick a SimulationState can be extracted from the SimulationRun.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:

      • getPanzerByID

        public Body getPanzerByID(int ID)
        searches all active Panzers for one with given ID.

        As Panzers are serialized at every simulation step, keeping references of them is strictly disallowed, if the referee is part of the simulation (like Projectiles, Mines and Explosions). This is the way to access a Panzer.

        Returns:
        Panzer with given ID, may be null.

      • getPanzers

        public java.util.List<Body> getPanzers()
        Returns:
        a List of all active Panzers.
